name: OrangeHRM
author: Brendan Coles <bcoles@gmail.com>
description: OrangeHRM - Open Source Human Resource Management Software (HRMS)

matches.regexp: (?-mix:<div id="content">\s+<h2>Welcome to the OrangeHRM ver ([^\s]+) Setup Wizard<\/h2>)
(?-mix:<div id="footer"><a href="http:\/\/www\.orangehrm\.com" target="_blank" tabindex="[^"^>]*">OrangeHRM<\/a> (Web Installation Wizard ver [^\s]+) © OrangeHRM Inc)
(?-mix:<div id="divFooter" >\s+<span id="spanCopyright">\s+<a href="http:\/\/www\.orangehrm\.com" target="_blank">OrangeHRM<\/a>\s+ver ([^&]+) © OrangeHRM Inc)
(?-mix:<td align="center"><a href="http:\/\/www\.orangehrm\.com" target="_blank">OrangeHRM<\/a> ver ([^\s]+) © OrangeHRM Inc)
